name: Jumpy Water-Jetpack Dude
description:
A single-level platformer where you fuel your jetpack with water, collect coins, and jump on enemies to squish them. 

Made for the JellySandwich Jam #1 Theme: Jumping.

-------------------------

Controls:

WASD = move

Mouse = camera

Space = jump (hold to use jetpack)

-------------------------

Music: "Bit Forest Intro music" by Bertsz
